attributes.action: STOP THE `MOD`FROM USING `DOGS` AS A THROW AWAY ITEM.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want to MOD to treat its DOGS with the respect they should have and NOT a THROW AWAY item as now, this is very poor information for the public who some do the same around Christmas each year and sets a poor example from a GOVERNMENT BODY who do just that, seeing the GOVERNMENT waste money on some things they could put up the funds to support these dogs after their use and protecting lives instead of putting them down when not needed any more, EVERYBODY should treat any ANIMAL with respect and look after it for the rest of its life.

Please sign if you agree on protecting ANIMALS.
